name: Admin-Logo-Title-URL Changer
author: Pratik Tambekar

sections.description:
This Plugin is use for to change WP Admin login page Icon, Title and URL Link. Once you have activated plugin one menu item Add Image will be activated after clicking on Add Image Upload Image panel will be open now you can upload image through that panel if image is already exist it update the previous image link otherwise it insert new image.

An answer to that question.

1Que> Activate plugin (after successfully activation one menu add image will be added in admin dashboard go to on add image select image and submit it)
2Que> Through Add Image Panel

What about foo bar?

PHP
wordpress
WPDB

Arbitrary section

plugins where more information needs to be conveyed that doesn’t fit into the categories of “description” or
“installation.” Arbitrary sections will be shown below the built-in sections outlined above.

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. Upload new image panel(name as Add Image)
  2. You can also able to change previous uploaded image
  3. Admin site Title changer

  4. Admin site URL Changer

    Something else about the plugin
    Plugin is fully bug free and open source to all now everywhere we require to change admin login look and feel also after clicking on logo will be redirected on our own site and when we hover on Image then our won site name should be appears on it.

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)

1) how to change logo?
2) how to upload image?

1.0

 manually Upload logo.png on mentioned location
 remaining things will change automatically
